body: Another aspect is that 0D tensor is a special case in current TFLite - many code cannot distinguish 0D and 1D tensor, and some workarounds are needed.
body_html: Another aspect is that 0D tensor is a special case in current TFLite - many code cannot distinguish 0D and 1D tensor, and some workarounds are needed.
